# MarshalStreamMatchResult.IsEndOfStream property

Indicates whether or not the end of the stream was reached while matching from the stream.

```csharp
public bool IsEndOfStream { get; }
```

## Remarks

If `IsEndOfStream`&gt; is `true` the value of `Success` will always be false.
